>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/governance/license-assignments/bulk-reclaim"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Iterates over the assignment IDs, reclaiming each one with a manual reason.
Collects successes and failures rather than failing fast.

  id={"request"}
